name: Cubelicator
description:
Use fullscreen to see the whole screen!

Controls

  • Use a and d to move
  • Tap space on a plate to duplicate

Description

The concept of this game was just an idea I had and it was entirely made in 3 days.

Use the colored plates to duplicate the cube. The red buttons are used to move the platforms.

Would be nice if you could comment your thoughts :D
